metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for interoperability between coding agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI

plugins.name: interpeer
plugins.description: Cross-AI peer review: qinterpeer (Codex CLI), interpeer (Oracle), winterpeer (LLM Council), splinterpeer (disagreement-driven development)

plugins.name: interdoc
plugins.description: Automatic, ambient CLAUDE.md maintenance - dual detection at session start and during commits, proactively suggests documentation updates without manual invocation
